name: Investment Outflow Tsunami
title: Massive Capital Outflows
description: In 2018, Liechtenstein experienced a significant foreign direct investment outflow, reaching -1303.11% of GDP, indicating a substantial capital movement out of the country.

name: Wealthy and Wise
title: Highest GNI Per Capita
description: In 2015, Liechtenstein boasted the highest GNI per capita globally, amounting to $137,688, showcasing its economic prosperity.

name: Safe Haven
title: Top Political Stability
description: As of 2023, Liechtenstein ranked in the 94.79th percentile for political stability, indicating a highly secure and peaceful environment.

name: Personalized Learning
title: Lowest Pupil-Teacher Ratio
description: In 2017, Liechtenstein had an impressively low pupil-teacher ratio of 5.6 in lower secondary education, ensuring personalized attention for students.

name: Research Powerhouse
title: Leading in R&D Researchers
description: With 18,130 researchers per million people in 2023, Liechtenstein is a global leader in research and development, fostering innovation and scientific progress.

name: Urban Village
title: Small Urban Population
description: In 2023, Liechtenstein's urban population stood at just 5,825, reflecting its small size and close-knit community.

name: Gender Imbalance Alert
title: High Sex Ratio at Birth
description: In 2023, the sex ratio at birth in Liechtenstein was 1.163 male births per female birth, indicating a gender imbalance at birth.
